page.title: 16Bayston Hill Scouts & Guides
page.content: In the Scout hut there are nine rooms.They are the Scouts' main room, the Guides' main hall,the Scouts' storeroom,the Guides storeroom,the Scout toilet,the Guide toilet,the leaders'room,the Kitchen,and the extra storeroom.There are{four Brownie packs {two Guide companies,one Beaver colony, {two Scout troops,four Cub packs,}and {the Rangers. Once a year the Cubs go to camp. Sometimes they go with another pack but they usually go on their own.We have been on lots of visits including Shrewsbury Fire station and the Police station.Every year we organise a summer fair and fireworks display on the Glebelands next to the Scout hut.At the bonfire there are fireworks and a big fire.At the summer fair there are raffles, fancy dress and lots of other stalls.
